void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    float val = texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(fragCoord), 0).x;
    int idx = int(val * 35.0);
    vec3 fire_val = fire[idx] / 255.0;
    fragColor = vec4(fire_val, 1.0);
}
